Samaneh  has extensive expertise in developing digital biomarkers and applied machine learning to analyse real healthcare data. 

She has a track record of creating novel machine learning models for various healthcare applications, including compact language models and representation learning for Electronic Healthcare Records, and transformer-based and representation learning for in-home data.
